hints.title: Synergistic Foster-Lyapunov (Established)
hints.content:
224: :label: thm-fl-established
225: 
226: Under the foundational axioms:
227: - Confining potential: $\langle \nabla U, x \rangle \geq \alpha_U |x|^2$
228: - Positive friction: $\gamma > 0$
229: - Positive noise: $\sigma_v^2 > 0$
230: 
231: The composed operator satisfies:
232: 
233: $$
234: \mathbb{E}[V_{\text{total}}(S_{t+1})] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{total}}\tau) V_{\text{total}}(S_t) + C_{\text{total}}
235: $$
236: 
237: with:
238: $$
239: \kappa_{\text{total}} = \min\left(\frac{\kappa_W\tau}{2}, \frac{c_V\kappa_x}{2}, \frac{c_V\gamma\tau}{2}, \frac{c_B(\kappa_b + \kappa_{\text{pot}}\tau)}{2}\right) > 0
240: $$
